name: rally camera
description:
Product Features:
• Ultra-HD imaging system
• Logitech RightLight™ technology
• Premium industrial design
• Automatic camera control
• Light/colour optimisation
• Adaptive pan, tilt and zoom
• Multiple installation options (Table or wall mount)
• 4K recording and streaming
• Plug-and-play easy

Product Specifications:
• External Dimension: 182.5 x 152 x 152mm
• Ultra-HD imaging system supports: 4K, 1440p, 1080p, 900p, 720p, and SD at 30fps | 1080p, 720p at 30fps and 60 fps
• Operating Systems: Windows® 7, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 | macOS 10.10 or higher
• Compatibility and Certifications:
Plug-and-play USB connectivity, Certified for Skype® for Business and Microsoft® Teams, Zoom® Certified, Fuze® Certified, Cisco® compatible | Compatible with Google Hangouts Meet™, BlueJeans®, BroadSoft®, GoToMeeting®, Vidyo®, and other video conferencing, recording, and broadcasting applications that support USB cameras

Package Contents:
• Rally Camera x1 • Remote control x1 • USB 3.0 Type-C cable x1
• Power adapter with regional plugs x1
• Power splitter & case x1
• Camera mount with mounting hardware x1
• Documentation x1
